ygData.msgSnippet: Melchana enters the Ship. Melchana: Prophecy, shields up. The computer acknowledges the command. The Tripredacus lady walks to the west side of the ship.

Melchana enters the Ship.

Melchana: Prophecy, shields up.

The computer acknowledges the command. The Tripredacus lady walks to 
the west side of the ship.

Melchana: The ship, Firedrill, is divided in three parts. The west 
side contains the cargo part, the right is where the renewal chamber 
is. The tower contains the Matrix Chamber and the command room. For 
now, we're going to the cargo bay where Belthassan is likely to be.

She enters the bay. Tankor is there with Belthassan, inventoring the 
energon fruits. They were huge fruits holding a massive bright 
blue charge of energon.

Belthassan: Ah! Sister! How good to see you! And you as well, 
Firedrill!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Firedrill --
> 
> Firedrill nods, "Sure," He follows Melchana, all the while glancing 
> around him at new surroundings, a sense of culture shock hits him 
> momentarily, but he shrugs it off.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Melchana shoots a sideglance at him.
> > 
> > Melchana: Yes, is it not? The feeling of the reformatting ritual 
> is 
> > also a... strong experience. We had to reformat the whole 
> landscape in 
> > order to power to our base. Follow me. My brother is waiting for 
> us 
> > now. Do you want to meet him before you go to the Renewal Chamber?
> > 
> > She rises from the piloting seat and slowly walks out.
